languages.text: "Пусть я уже не вижу столь отчетливо, как раньше... Видения все еще посещают мой разум. И я чувствую, что там, куда ты идешь, готовится преступление. Ты можешь его остановить, а значит твой путь должен быть чист".

"I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."
languages.original_text: "Пусть я уже не вижу столь отчетливо, как раньше... Видения все еще посещают мой разум. И я чувствую, что там, куда ты идешь, готовится преступление. Ты можешь его остановить, а значит твой путь должен быть чист".

traits.locale_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once have... but visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense that a crime is being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it; therefore your path must be clear."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once have... but visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense that a crime is being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it; therefore your path must be clear."

traits.locale_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «Quizá no vea con la misma claridad que antaño... pero las visiones aún no son ajenas a mi mente. Y percibo que se está tramando alguna infamia en el sitio al que va. Usted es capaz de ponerle fin, lo que significa que su camino debería estar claro».
languages.original_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."

traits.locale_text: «Quizá no vea con la misma claridad que antaño... pero las visiones aún no son ajenas a mi mente. Y percibo que se está tramando alguna infamia en el sitio al que va. Es usted capaz de ponerle fin; por tanto, su camino debería estar claro».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “或许我的目光不再像以前那样清晰……但幻景并没有完全离开我的脑海。我能感觉到，在你要去的地方，有人正密谋着卑鄙勾当，而你可以阻止它。正因如此，你通往那里的道路必须畅通无阻。”
languages.original_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."

traits.locale_text: “或许我的目光不再像以前那样清晰……但幻景并没有完全离开我的脑海。我能感觉到，在你要去的地方，有人正密谋着卑鄙勾当，而你可以阻止它。因此，你通往那里的道路必须畅通无阻。”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Je ne vois peut-être plus aussi clairement qu'autrefois... mais les visions n'ont pas totalement abandonné mon esprit et je sens que de sombres desseins se trament là où vous vous rendez. Vous êtes capable d'y mettre fin, c'est pourquoi vous devez avoir le champ libre. »
languages.original_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois peut-être plus aussi clairement qu'autrefois... mais les visions n'ont pas totalement abandonné mon esprit et je sens que de sombres desseins se trament là où vous vous rendez. Vous êtes capable d'y mettre fin, c'est pourquoi vous devez avoir le champ libre. »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「かつてのような鮮明な視界は得られなくなったが…ビジョンは私の心を完全に見捨てたわけではない。あなたが行こうとしている場所で、何か下劣な企てが企てられようとしているのを感じる。あなたはそれを止めることができる。だからこそ、あなたの道は明らかでなければならない」
languages.original_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."

traits.locale_text: 「かつてのような鮮明な視界は得られなくなったが…ビジョンは私の心を完全に見捨てたわけではない。あなたが行こうとしている場所で、何か下劣な企てが企てられようとしているのを感じる。あなたはそれを止めることができる。だからこそ、あなたの道は明らかでなければならない」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Ich sehe sie vielleicht nicht mehr ganz so klar wie einst ... doch die Visionen haben meinen Verstand noch nicht völlig verlassen. Und ich spüre, dass an dem Ort, an den Ihr reisen wollt, schändliche Pläne geschmiedet werden. Ihr könnt sie aufhalten. Daher ist Euer Pfad klar."
languages.original_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe sie vielleicht nicht mehr ganz so klar wie einst ... doch die Visionen haben meinen Verstand noch nicht völlig verlassen. Und ich spüre, dass an dem Ort, an den Ihr reisen wollt, schändliche Pläne geschmiedet werden. Ihr könnt sie aufhalten. Daher ist Euer Pfad klar."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Artık bir zamanlar olduğu kadar berrak göremiyor olabilirim... Fakat görüler, zihnimi tamamen terk etmedi. Gittiğin yerde sana karşı aşağılık bir girişim planlandığını hissediyorum. Bunu durdurabilecek durumdasın, yani yolun açık olmalı."
languages.original_text: "I may not see as clearly now as I once did... but the visions have not altogether forsaken my mind. And I sense some vile enterprise being plotted where you are going. You are able to stop it, which means your path must be clear."

traits.locale_text: "Artık bir zamanlar olduğu kadar berrak göremiyor olabilirim... Fakat görüler zihnimi tamamen terk etmediler. Gittiğin yerde sana karşı aşağılık bir girişim planlandığını hissediyorum. Bunu durdurabilecek seviyedesin, yani yolun açık olmalı."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion
